summary: A giant, ancient moth begins to attack Japan when coming to the rescue of its two, foot-tall worshippers who were taken by shipwreck survivors.
cast: Furankî Sakai|Hiroshi Koizumi|Kyôko Kagawa|Yumi Itô|Emi Itô|Jerry Itô|Ken Uehara|Takashi Shimura|Tetsu Nakamura|Seizaburô Kawazu|Yoshifumi Tajima|Akihiko Hirata|Kenji Sahara|Yoshio Kosugi|Kôji Iwamoto|Kô Mishima|Toshio Miura|Akira Wakamatsu|Hiroshi Akitsu|Hiroshi Takagi|Osman Yusuf|Yasuhisa Tsutsumi|Obel Wyatt|Harold Conway|Teruko Mita|Robert Dunham|Masamitsu Tayama|Ren Yamamoto|Haruya Katô|Rinsaku Ogata|Yutaka Nakayama|Kôji Uno|Wataru Ômae|Kazuo Hinata|Mitsuo Matsumoto|Hiroyuki Satake|Shôichi Hirose|Toshihiko Furuta|Gorô Sakurai|Keisuke Matsuyama|Takeo Nagashima|Kôji Kamimura|Akira Yamada|Mitsuo Tsuda|Akio Kusama|Tadashi Okabe|Hideo Shibuya|Shigeo Katô|Kazuo Imai|Yutaka Oka|Kô Hayami|Yoshio Katsube|Haruo Nakajima|Katsumi Tezuka|Ryôji Shimizu|Yôichirô Kitagawa|Junpei Natsuki|Junnosuke Suda|Toku Ihara|Yû Sekita|Akira Kitchôji|Masaaki Tachibana|Toshiko Nakano|Tsurue Ichimanji|Tatsuo Sakai|Nanako Yamada|Nichigeki Danshingu Chîmu|Bin Furuya|Animatronic Puppet
title: Mothra
